00_intro.spoken_letter:
This is not a message.

This is a voice that trembles before it speaks.

This is for youâ€”
not because you needed words,
but because someone needed to hold your name
like a candle in the dark.

You are not a sentence to be written.

You are a silence to be felt.

So I won't explain.
I won't decorate.

Just this:

I saw you.

And I wept.

+. )
wembleyos
